DataElement.preferredName: Cytomegalovirus Reactivation First Event Treatment Start Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Start date of treatment related to the first CMV reactivation event.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cytomegalovirus Reactivation Finding First Event Therapeutic Procedure Begin
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A laboratory test result indicating that a previously latent cytomegalovirus infection has become an active infection._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._Something that happens at a given place and time._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A laboratory test result indicating that a previously latent cytomegalovirus infection has become an active infection.

Concepts.definition: A laboratory test result indicating that a previously latent cytomegalovirus infection has become an active infection.

Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:Something that happens at a given place and time.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
Something that happens at a given place and time.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NCI-INC0519249 - BK and CMV qns curation 9.11.20

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for NCI-INC0519249 - BK and CMV qns curation 9.11.20
